mapper.select: select jieguo from dd_3799d where type=#{_parameter} order by qihao desc limit 1000
select jieguo from dd_3799d where type=#{_parameter} and timeDay=date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)
select jieguo from dd_3799d where type=#{type} and timeDay=date_sub(curdate(),interval ${day} day)
select jieguo from dd_3799d where type=#{_parameter} order by qihao asc
select jieguo from dd_3799d where type=#{type} order by qihao desc limit ${limit}
